definition: hamstring (anatomy)/see also 膕繩肌|腘绳肌[guo2 sheng2 ji1]
popliteal (anatomy)/hollow at the back of the knee

sentences.english: This pose creates an intense stretch of the hamstrings in the straight leg.
sentences.chinese: 这个体式充分伸展了直腿一侧的腘旁肌。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical value of rehabilitation nursing after substitute popliteal vein valve operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腘静脉肌袢代瓣术后患者的康复护理。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the efficacy of color ultrasound-guided interventional treatment for popliteal cyst.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨彩超引导下腘窝囊肿介入治疗的价值。

sentences.english: The rabbits were in the supine position when the popliteal lymph nodes were scanned in the axial and sagittal planes.
sentences.chinese: 仰卧位固定兔子，轴位和矢状位扫描双侧腘窝淋巴结。

sentences.english: Unless the patient has a very sensitive bowstring sign, no pain is felt in the popliteal fossa region.
sentences.chinese: 除非病人感觉过敏，通常在腘窝区没有疼痛。

sentences.english: Objective To study the early diagnosis and treatment of the blunt popliteal artery injury.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨闭合性腘动静脉钝性损伤的诊治方法。

sentences.english: Exercise emphasized quadriceps, hamstrings, calf strengthening and proprioception training.
sentences.chinese: 行使强调股四头肌，腘，小牛加强和本体培训。

sentences.english: Extend the hamstrings. Create arches in the feet.
sentences.chinese: 伸展腘绳肌，脚建立起足弓。

sentences.english: The hamstrings are three long muscles that cover the back of the thighs.
sentences.chinese: 腘绳肌是覆盖大腿后侧的三条长条形肌肉。

sentences.english: To investigate a new treatment method of popliteal cyst under arthroscope and evaluate its effects meanwhile.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨关节镜下腘窝囊肿的治疗方法和疗效。

sentences.english: To study the diagnosis and therapy principle of popliteal artery trauma.
sentences.chinese: 探讨腘动脉损伤的诊断及处理原则。

definition: kneecapping/to cut or smash the kneecaps as corporal punishment
ilium/outermost bone of the pelvic girdle/Taiwan pr. [ka4]
(literary) hip bone/(TCM) space between two joints
popliteal (anatomy)/hollow at the back of the knee
biceps (in Chinese medicine)/(arch.) forelimbs of livestock animal
